tool.name: StripSdeCredentials

param.name: root_folder
param.dialogReference: Top-level directory to scan. The tool walks all subdirectories recursively looking for .lyr and .mxd files.
param.pythonReference: Top-level directory to scan. The tool walks all subdirectories recursively looking for .lyr and .mxd files.

param.name: sde_username
param.dialogReference: The database username whose embedded credentials should be stripped. Matching is case-insensitive.
param.pythonReference: The database username whose embedded credentials should be stripped. Matching is case-insensitive.

param.name: replacement_sde
param.dialogReference: A clean .sde connection file that does not store credentials. This replaces the existing workspace path on every matched layer.
param.pythonReference: A clean .sde connection file that does not store credentials. This replaces the existing workspace path on every matched layer.

param.name: process_lyr
param.dialogReference: Check to include .lyr layer files in the scan. Uncheck to skip all .lyr files.
param.pythonReference: Check to include .lyr layer files in the scan. Uncheck to skip all .lyr files.

param.name: process_mxd
param.dialogReference: Check to include .mxd map documents in the scan. Uncheck to skip all .mxd files.
param.pythonReference: Check to include .mxd map documents in the scan. Uncheck to skip all .mxd files.

param.name: message_level
param.dialogReference: Controls output verbosity. Minimal: compact progress counters and summary. Verbose: full per-layer diagnostic output. Unhinged: Verbose output with bonus commentary.
param.pythonReference: Controls output verbosity. Minimal: compact progress counters and summary. Verbose: full per-layer diagnostic output. Unhinged: Verbose output with bonus commentary.

tool.summary: Scans a folder for .lyr and .mxd files containing SDE layers with embedded credentials for a target username, and replaces the workspace path with a clean .sde connection file that does not save credentials.
tool.usage: Point the tool at a root folder, specify the SDE username to match, and provide a clean .sde connection file. The tool recursively scans for .lyr and .mxd files, identifies layers whose workspace path contains embedded credentials for the target username, and replaces the workspace path with the clean connection file.
